DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study obtain preliminary pharmacokinetic profile MK-7145 2 mg immediate release ( IR ) follow single-dose administration male participant moderate renal insufficiency . In addition , study evaluate pharmacodynamic effect single dose MK-7145 2 mg IR 24-hour net natriuresis male participant moderate renal insufficiency .
DOC.brief_title: The Pharmacokinetics MK-7145 Following Single Dose Administration Participants With Moderate Renal Insufficiency ( MK-7145-018 )
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 35 kg/m^2 Nonsmoker and/or use nicotine nicotinecontaining product least 3 month prior enrollment Estimated glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) 30 60 mL/min/1.73 m^2 History stroke , chronic seizure , major neurological disorder Ongoing , clinically significant endocrine , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hematological , hepatic , immunological , respiratory , genitourinary abnormality diseases Systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) ≤95 mmHg > 160 mmHg , diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) ≤45 mmHg > 95 mmHg History neoplastic disease except adequately treat nonmelanomatous skin carcinoma Unable refrain , anticipate use , strong/moderate cytochrome P450 3A4 ( CYP3A4 ) inhibitor Consumes excessive amount alcohol , define great 3 glass alcoholic beverage , wine , distilled spirit per day Consumes excessive amount caffeine , define great 6 serving coffee , tea , cola , caffeinated beverage per day Had major surgery donate blood within 8 week prior enrollment Has participate another investigational study within 4 week prior History significant multiple and/or severe allergy ( include latex allergy ) , anaphylactic reaction significant intolerance prescription nonprescription drug food Currently regular user illicit drug , history drug ( include alcohol ) abuse within approximately 6 month Has active history nephrolithiasis Has kidney remove functioning renal transplant
